spirit:component.spirit:name: bd_soc_axi_uart16550_0_0

spirit:register.spirit:name: RBR_THR_DLL
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Receiver Buffer Register or Transmitter Holding Register or Divisor Latch (LSB) Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Receiver Buffer Register or Transmitter Holding Register or Divisor Latch (LSB) Register. Based on DLAB bit in LCR register following register is selected. DLAB = 0 then Read is from RBR register. DLAB = 0 then Write in to THR register. DLAB = 1 then DLL register is selected.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RBR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Last received character

spirit:field.spirit:name: THR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Holds the character to be transmitted next

spirit:field.spirit:name: DLL
spirit:field.spirit:description: Divisor Latch Least Significant Byte Note: On reset, the DLL gets configured for 9600 Baud. The DLL reset value, [LSB(divisor)] is calculated from the formula, divisor = AXI CLK frequency/(16 x 9600)).

spirit:register.spirit:name: IER_DLM
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Interrupt Enable Register or Divisor Latch (MSB) Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable Register or Divisor Latch (MSB) Register. Based on DLAB bit in LCR register following register is selected. DLAB = 0 then IER register is selected. DLAB = 1 then DLM register is selected.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IER_ERBFI
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - Disables Received Data Available Interrupts. 1 - Enables Received Data Available Interrupts.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IER_ETBEI
spirit:field.spirit:displayName: Enable Transmitter Holding Register Empty Interrupt
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - Disables Transmitter Holding Register Empty Interrupts. 1 - Enables Transmitter Holding Register Interrupts.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IER_ELSI
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - Disables Receiver Line Status Interrupts. 1 - Enables Receiver Line Status Interrupts.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IER_EDSSI
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - Disables Modem Status Interrupts. 1 - Enables Modem Status Interrupts.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DLM
spirit:field.spirit:description: Divisor Latch Most Significant Byte Note: On reset, the DLM gets configured for 9600 Baud. The DLM reset value, [MSB(divisor)] is calculated from the formula, divisor = (AXI CLK frequency/(16 x 9600)).

spirit:register.spirit:name: IIR_FCR
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Interrupt Identification Register or FIFO Control Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Identification Register or FIFO Control Register. Based on DLAB bit in LCR register following register is selected. DLAB = 0 then Read is from IIR register. DLAB = 0 then Write in to FCR register. DLAB = 1 then FCR register is selected.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IIR_INTPEND
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - Interrupt is pending 1 - No interrupt is pending

spirit:field.spirit:name: IIR_INTID2
spirit:field.spirit:description: 011 - Receiver Line Status (Highest) 010 - Received Data Available (Second) 110 - Character Timeout (Second) 001 - Transmitter Holding Register Empty (Third) 000 - Modem Status (Fourth)

spirit:field.spirit:name: IIR_FIFOEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: Always zero if not in FIFO mode. 0 - 16450 mode 1 - 16550 mode

spirit:field.spirit:name: FCR_FIFOEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Enables FIFOs. 0 - Disables FIFOs

spirit:field.spirit:name: FCR_RCVR_FIFO_Reset
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Resets RCVR FIFO

spirit:field.spirit:name: FCR_XMIT_FIFO_Reset
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Resets XMIT FIFO

spirit:field.spirit:name: FCR_DMA_MODE_Select
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - Mode 0. 1 - Mode 1

spirit:field.spirit:name: FCR_RCVR_FIFO_Trigger_Level
spirit:field.spirit:description: RCVR FIFO Trigger Level. 00 - 1 byte. 01 - 4 bytes. 10 - 8 bytes. 11 - 14 bytes.

spirit:field.spirit:name: WLS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 00 - 5 bits/character 01 - 6 bits/character 10 - 7 bits/character 11 - 8 bits/character

spirit:field.spirit:name: STB
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - 1 Stop bit. 1 - 2 Stop bits or 1.5, if 5 bits/character selected. The receiver checks for 1 stop bit only regardless of the number of stop bits selected.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Enables parity. 0 - Disables parity

spirit:field.spirit:name: EPS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Selects Even parity. 0 - Selects Odd parity.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Stick_Parity
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - When bits 3, 4 are logic 1 the Parity bit is transmitted and checked as a logic 0. If bit 4 is a logic 0 and bit 3 is logic 1 then the Parity bit is transmitted and checked as a logic 1. 0 - Stick Parity is disabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Set_Break
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 = Enables break condition. Sets SOUT to 0 and cause break condition. 0 = Disables break condition

spirit:field.spirit:name: DLAB
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Allows access to the Divisor Latch Registers and reading of the FIFO Control Register. 0 - Allows access to RBR, THR, IER and IIR registers.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Drives DTRN Low. 0 - Drives DTRN High

spirit:field.spirit:name: RTS
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Drives RTSN Low. 0 - Drives RTSN High.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Out1
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Drives OUT1N Low. 0 - Drives OUT1N High

spirit:field.spirit:name: Out2
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Drives OUT2N Low. 0 - Drives OUT2N High.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Loop
spirit:field.spirit:description: 1 - Enables loopback 0 - Disables loopback

spirit:field.spirit:name: DR
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - All the data in RBR or FIFO is read. 1 - Complete incoming character has been received and transferred into the RBR of FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: OE
spirit:field.spirit:description: RBR not read before next character is received, thereby destroying the previous character. In FIFO mode, data continues to fill the FIFO beyond the trigger level, an overrun error occurs only after the FIFO is full and the next character has been completely received in the shift register. The character in the shift register is overwritten but it is not transferred to the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates that the received data character does not have correct even or odd parity as selected by the Even parity select bit. In FIFO mode, this error is associated with a particular character in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Character missing a stop bit. In framing error, the UART attempts to re-synchronize by assuming that the framing error was due to next character start bit, so it samples start bit twice and then takes in following data. In FIFO mode, this error is associated with a particular character in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BI
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set when SIN is held Low for an entire character time. (Start + data bits + Parity + Stop bits). In FIFO mode, this error is associated with a particular character in FIFO. The next character transfer is enabled if the Sin goes to marking state and receives the next valid start bit.

spirit:field.spirit:name: THRE
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - THR or Transmitter FIFO has data to transmit. 1 - THR is empty. In FIFO mode, Transmitter FIFO is empty.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TEMT
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 - THR or Transmitter shift register contains data. 1 - THR and Transmitter shift register empty In FIFO mode, Transmitter FIFO and shift register are both empty.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Error_in_RCVR_FIFO
spirit:field.spirit:description: RCVR FIFO contains at least one receiver error (Parity, Framing, Break condition).

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCTS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Change in CTSN after last MSR read.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DDSR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Change in DSRN after last MSR read.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TERI
spirit:field.spirit:description: RIN has changed from a Low to a High.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DDCD
spirit:field.spirit:description: Change in DCDN after last MSR read

spirit:field.spirit:name: CTS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Complement of CTSN input

spirit:field.spirit:name: DSR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Complement of DSRN input

spirit:field.spirit:name: RI
spirit:field.spirit:description: Complement of RIN input

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCD
spirit:field.spirit:description: Complement of DCDN input

spirit:field.spirit:name: Scratch
spirit:field.spirit:description: Hold user data

spirit:component.spirit:description: The AXI Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter (UART) 16550 connects to the AMBA (Advance Microcontroller Bus Architecture) AXI (Advanced eXtensible Interface) and provides the controller interface for asynchronous serial data transfer

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_EXTERNAL_XIN_CLK_HZ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: External clock frequency must be less than half of AXI CLK Frequency.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_EXTERNAL_XIN_CLK_HZ_d
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: External clock frequency must be less than half of AXI CLK Frequency.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_HAS_EXTERNAL_XIN
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Use External CLK for BAUD Rate

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_ACLK_FREQ_HZ_d
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: AXI4-Lite clock frequency range should be in between 25 to 300MHz.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_ACLK_FREQ_HZ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: AXI4-Lite clock frequency range should be in between 25 to 300MHz.
